_header: O sweet Jesu so meek and mild / Fili Marie virginis
Subjects: carols, to Christ; Christ, carols to
_description: James Ryman, ‘Succurre nobis miseris’, a macaronic hymn to Christ — five quatrains (abab) including refrain, ‘Succure nobis miseris’ and burden: ‘Fili marie uirgiinis / Succurre nobis miseris’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O sweete Ihesu so meke and myldeffili marie
                    virginis…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…ffro blysse thatte we be not reiecteSuccurre nobis
                        miseris
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 333-4.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 195; 1977, 172.
